block.dim_bag.bag_eye: The All Seeing Eye Of The Dimentional Rift
tooltip.upgrade.row: Add an additional row to the bag inventory, up to a maximum of %d rows
tooltip.upgrade.column: Add an additional column to the bag inventory, up to a maximum of %d columns
inventory.player_interface.name: Player Inventory: %s
inventory.upgrades.row.description: add an extra row to your bag inventory, increasing it's storage capacity
inventory.upgrades.column.description: add an extra column to your bag inventory, increasing it's storage capacity
inventory.upgrades.radius.description: increase the size of the current room (main room if applied to the bag directly) by 1 block in all directions
